eu.wauz.wauzcore.oneblock

Class OnePhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.oneblock.OnePhase

  • public class OnePhase
extends java.lang.Object
    A phase of the one-block gamemode.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    OnePhaseLevel, OneChest

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The display name of the phase.
      private static java.util.List<OnePhase> phases
      A list of all one-block phases.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init()
        Initializes all one-block phases from the config and fills the internal phase map.
        See Also:
        OneBlockConfigurator.getAllPhaseKeys()

      • get

        public static OnePhase get(int phase)
        Gets the requested one-block phase. If the phase is bigger than the phase count, the first phase is returned.
        Parameters:
        phase - The number of the phase.
        Returns:
        The requested phase.

      • count

        public static int count()
        Returns:
        The count of all one-block phases.

      • getLevel

        public OnePhaseLevel getLevel(int level)
        Gets the requested one-block phase level. If the level is bigger than the level count, the first level is returned.
        Parameters:
        level - The number of the level.
        Returns:
        The requested level.

      • tryToSpawnMob

        public boolean tryToSpawnMob(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Spawns a mob at the given location, depending on the phase's chances.
        Parameters:
        location - The mob spawn location.
        Returns:
        If a mob was spawned.
